scripts.test: firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore --project bsc-lab "npm run test:run-seeded"
scripts.test:headed: firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore --project bsc-lab "npm run test:run-seeded:headed"
scripts.test:run: npm run test:structures && npm run test:rdf && npm run test:state && playwright test
scripts.test:run:headed: npm run test:structures && npm run test:rdf && npm run test:state && playwright test --headed
scripts.test:run-seeded: npm run seed:firestore && npm run test:run
scripts.test:run-seeded:headed: npm run seed:firestore && npm run test:run:headed
